thread.title: J Jefferson Davis
thread.title_full: WholeLatteLove.com reviewed by J Jefferson Davis

author: J Jefferson Davis
title: J Jefferson Davis
text: I have purchased espresso machines, a burr grinder and supplies from Wholelattelove over a period of many years. I have also spent time on the phone discussing features and differences in machines I was thinking about purchasing. The person I spoke with was knowledgeable, professional, and pleasant. This company earns an A+ from me.
